definition:
The *natural homomorphism* $R \rightarrow R/I$ where $R$ is a ring and
$I$ an ideal of $R$ is the map $\alpha \mapsto \alpha + I$. Coset
operations, e.g $(\alpha + \beta) + I = (\alpha + I) + (\beta + I)$
guarantee this will be a homomorphism. Natural homomorphisms for groups
can be defined similarly.
